translations: v．包覆，结壳：在物体表面形成或附着一层硬皮或外壳。
· The saltwater encrusts the rocks along the shore.
海水在岸边的岩石上结成了盐壳。

sentences.sentence: Those qualities are still there, visible only to those who can tear away the carapace of convention that encrusts the Mona Lisa.
sentences.translation: 这些特质依然存在，但只有那些能够撕开蒙娜丽莎身上那层厚重的，用常规构制的外壳的人才能看见。
